data.title: Schedule for COVID-19 testing in Onondaga County schools released
data.meta_description: Onondaga County announced the COVID-19 testing schedule for 27 additional schools located in its orange zone and newly expanded yellow zone on Saturday evening.  The county previously announced the schedule for 30 other schools on Friday. Those schools will be tested on Monday, November 30, and Tuesday, December 1. There are 119 schools in the orange and yellow zones. Registration information will be distributed by individual districts.
data.text:
Onondaga County announced the COVID-19 testing schedule for 27 additional schools located in its orange zone and newly expanded yellow zone on Saturday evening.

The county previously announced the schedule for Those schools will be tested on Monday, November 30, and Tuesday, December 1.

There are in the orange and yellow zones. Registration information will be distributed by individual districts.

In the orange zone, schools must go remote for at least four days and test all students and staff members before they return to district buildings. Then, they must test 25% of students and staff on a weekly basis.

In the yellow zone, schools must test 20% of students and staff each week.

The following schools will begin testing Monday, November 30:

All Saints Elementary School 12:00pm - 1:35pm

Faith Heritage 8:30am - 12:50pm

Holy Cross 12pm - 2:30pm

Jowonio 8:30am - 11:00am

Living Word Academy 8:30am - 1:50pm

Lyncourt 8:30am - 2:20pm

McCarthy @ Beard School 8:30am - 10:35am

Montessori at Lemoyne 8:30am - 1:25pm

MontessoriSchool of Syracuse 8:30am - 10:40am

Most Holy Rosary School 8:30 am - 11 am

Onondaga Hill Middle School 12pm - 2:40pm

Solvay Middle School 12:00pm - 2:05pm

Syracuse Hebrew Day School 8:30am - 10:55am

The following schools will begin testing Tuesday, December 1:

OCM BOCES (Thompson) All Day

The following schools will begin testing Thursday, December 3:

The following schools will begin testing Friday, December 4:

An additional 25 schools still need to be scheduled for testing.
